content: Siama/Sean - I think I ran into a typo in the "MedicationStatement" resources. There is a reference within the JSON sample data files that Caleb generated that appears to be invalid. Attached is a sample file "MedicationStatement-Medication-Statement-1.json". Please take a look at the reference - "basedOn:reference:Medication-Request-1". I believe this should be "basedOn:reference:MedicationRequest/Medication-Request-1". There are 9 MedicationStatement JSON files that may need to be fixed if this is true. MedicationStatement-Medication-Statement-1.json
Nancy pointed out this problem yesterday and I already fixed it and provided her new MedicationStatement instances. I will send them to you.

Caleb Wan said:

Nancy pointed out this problem yesterday and I already fixed it and provided her new MedicationStatement instances. I will send them to you.

@Forrest White - just making sure you see this message. Thanks @Caleb Wan .
Thank you @Siama and @Nancy Lushand @Caleb Wan
Yes, these are already on the hub and I explained to Ed early this AM

A note about the PACIO Use Case JSON files for Connectathon:
The file DeviceUseStatement-BFS-Hospital-Admission-Mobility-SelfCare-1-UseOfDevice-5.json included in Connectathon-JSON-sets-2020-09-09.zip contains a bad link and should not be used. I updated Observation-BFS-Hospital-Admission-Mobility-SelfCare-1.json so that the bad file is no longer needed and can simply be deleted. Be sure to get this new file to replace the existing file in the Functional-Mobility-and-SelfCare folder: Observation-BFS-Hospital-Admission-Mobility-SelfCare-1.json
Thank you for the updated files @Caleb Wan
